title: 74/361/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 June 1974 exempting the United Kingdom from applying to certain species the Council Directive of 14 June 1966 on the marketing of cereal seed (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 June 1974  exempting the United Kingdom from applying to certain species the Council Directive of 14 June 1966 on the marketing of cereal seed  (Only the English text is authentic)  (74/361/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The United Kingdom is exempt from applying the Council Directive of 14 June 1966 on the marketing of cereal seed, with the exception of the provisions of Article 14 (1) to the species listed below:    (a) Oryza sativa L. - rice;
(b) Phalaris canariensis L. - canary grass.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 June 1974.
For the Commission
The President
François-Xavier ORTOLI  (1)OJ No 125, 11.7.1966, p. 2309/66. (2)OJ No L 356, 27.12.1973, p. 79.
